Instruction: In a large bowl, combine the flour and salt. Gradually add water to create a soft dough.
Place the rolled-out dough onto a large skillet or pan over medium heat. Cook each round for about 1 minute on each side, or until lightly golden and cooked through.
Heat a griddle over medium-high heat. Cook each piece of dough on the griddle until bubbles and blisters form, approximately 2 minutes. Flip and cook until the other side is lightly browned.
